00048 #include "XiCathInterface.h"
00049 #include <stdio.h>
00051 class VTK_ESQUI_HAPTICS_EXPORT vtkVSP:public vtkHaptic

00053 
00054 public:
00055 
00057     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkVSP, vtkObject);
00059     static vtkVSP *New();
00060     const char *GetClassName() { return "vtkVSP"; }
00062     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00063 
00065     virtual int Init();
00066 
00068     virtual void Update();
00069 
00071     virtual void Release();
00072 
00074     void UpdateDevice();

00077     float *GetLeftJoystickState();
00078

00081 
00083     void GetLeftJoystickState(float *data1,float *data2);
00084 
00086     float *GetRightJoystickState();
00087 
00089     void GetRightJoystickState(float data[2]);
00090 
00092     void GetRightJoystickState(float *data1,float *data2);
00093 
00095     float GetLeftJoystickYPosition() { return this->DevicePanel.joyLeft.up;}
00096 
00098     float GetLeftJoystickXPosition() { return this->DevicePanel.joyLeft.right;}
00099 
00101     float GetRightJoystickYPosition() { return this->DevicePanel.joyRight.up;}
00102 
00104     float GetRightJoystickXPosition() { return this->DevicePanel.joyRight.right;}
00105 
00107     int GetButtonsState() {return this->DevicePanel.buttons;}
00108 
00110     int GetZoomState();
00111

00114

00117

00123

00126 
00128     int GetRightPedalState();
00129 
00131     float GetCatheterDepth(int id)
00132     {
00133         switch(id)
00134         {
00135             case 0:
00136                 return this->GetCatheter0Depth();
00137             case 1:
00138                 return this->GetCatheter1Depth();
00139             case 2:
00140                 return this->GetCatheter2Depth();
00141             default:
00142                 return 0;
00143         }
00144     }
00145 
00147     int GetCatheterState(int id)
00148     {
00149         switch(id)
00150         {
00151             case 0:
00152                 return this->GetCatheter0State();
00153             case 1:
00154                 return this->GetCatheter1State();
00155             case 2:
00156                 return this->GetCatheter2State();
00157             default:
00158                 return 0;
00159         }
00160     }
00161 
00163     float GetCatheterRoll(int id)
00164     {
00165         switch(id)
00166         {
00167             case 0:
00168                 return this->GetCatheter0Roll();
00169             case 1:
00170                 return this->GetCatheter1Roll();
00171             case 2:
00172                 return this->GetCatheter2Roll();
00173             default:
00174                 return 0;
00175         }
00176 
00177     }
00178 
00180     int GetCatheter0State();
00182     float GetCatheter0Depth();
00184     float GetCatheter0Roll();
00185 
00187     int GetCatheter1State();
00189     float GetCatheter1Depth();
00191     float GetCatheter1Roll();
00192 
00194     int GetCatheter2State();
00196     float GetCatheter2Depth();
00198     float GetCatheter2Roll();
00199 
00201     float GetStentDeployment(){return this->DevicePanel.stentDeployment;};
00202 
00204     float GetContrastFlow(){return this->DevicePanel.contrastFlow;};
00205 
00207     float GetInflationPressure(){return this->DevicePanel.inflationPressure;};

00210     XiControlPanelState DevicePanel;

00212     XiCathState Catheter1;
00213     XiCathState Catheter2;
